New Records: Kohli equalled Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds
Key Match Events: Kohli scored an unbeaten 122 off 94 balls
India defended 10 runs in the final over to win by 243 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance and enjoyment of the game
Kohli equated his record to Sachin Tendulkar and expressed admiration for him
India's performance was described as sending a'stiff warning' to the rest of the field
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Eden Gardens, Kolkata
India won the match by 243 runs
